resources.string: To continue, you need to make some settings, click the button below to continue
For security reasons, it will be necessary to do a Captcha check, click the button below to continue
For now, there is nothing to show â™ªâ™«â™ª
Hello, below you will find useful information about the operation of the application and at the end the permission to access the notification that is necessary to finalize the panel configuration.

To find out which song is being played on your device, it is necessary to access the information by notifying the music player (such as title, name and duration of the song). Don\'t worry, no data is collected.
Not all music players can be supported, as music players must transmit valid information about the music being played.
All lyrics are provided by Vagalume.

An Internet connection is required to search for the lyrics of the song, however, if any lyrics have already been found, they will be automatically stored in the cache, so you can access the lyrics stored in the cache even without an Internet connection.

Internet connection is required to search for the lyrics of the song, however if any lyrics have already been found, they will be automatically saved in cache, so you can access the lyrics saved in cache even without an internet connection.
Now that you know how it works, to continue, it is necessary to grant permission to access notifications.

Important tip: If the panel is not updating or looking for lyrics when playing music, try restarting the device, if the problem still persists, it is probably because the music player you are using should not be compatible.
Why is permission to access notifications required?
How are the lyrics of the songs found?
Can I access the lyrics without an internet connection?
Please enter the numbers that appear in the image above in the field below
There was an error loading the captcha, check your internet connection and try to reload the captcha

Shows the lyrics of the song even if the result found has been approximated
If possible, tracks longer than 20 minutes (such as podcasts) will be ignored
If available, shows the button to translate lyric
